channel.title: Guides child board
channel.description:
Do you guys think it would be a good idea to add a Guides section under the "2007 Discussion"? The clear purpose of the board would be so players could write guides to help each other out.
[b]Question[/b]: "Mister handsome The elve age, why would we need a new section when they can just post it here?"
[b]Answer[/b]: If we had a section specifically for guides we'd seen an increase on how the community correlates. People would see we have a guides section and write guides for it. We haven't seen any guides posted because if they were posted they'd sink to the endless abyss of pages.
I myself would write a couple guides for money making, pure developing, and any guides really requested. Anyways, discuss.

item.title: Guides child board
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:17, topic:508224”]I don’t know what this has its own category in the first place… if anything I suggest moving it back into the Runescape category, and then think about adding the child board…[/quote]This is our initial plan, we’re discussing the exact details

Read full topic

item.title: Guides child board
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I don’t know what this has its own category in the first place… if anything I suggest moving it back into the Runescape category, and then think about adding the child board…

Read full topic

item.title: Guides child board
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

No need. No guides are ever posted, and if there was one to be posted, there would probably be a better version of it elsewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Guides child board
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

Don’t really see the need until some guides get posted in here. …professional looking guides that is.

Read full topic

item.title: Guides child board
item.dc:creator: @vortex vortex
item.description:
@vortex wrote:

or we could just have a sticky with links to all the guides related to this game on other sites

Read full topic

item.title: Guides child board
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You could post your guides here, without doubt. Although I do think that a guides section is a decent idea. The only thing that is necessary before adding a section though is ensuring that it will be used. At the moment, I haven’t really seen any guides at all in this section, so there’s no safe way to guarantee its popularity. If guides are made then I would think a section should be added.

Just my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Guides child board
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:10, topic:508224”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=626463.msg4260327#msg4260327 date=1363401089]
because you guys are going to rewrite the guides that are already written on the hundreds of runescape fansites? COOL!
[/quote]
YEAH MANG, BECAUSE HOW ELSE WILL PEOPLE FIND THEIR GUIDES??[/quote]
not by searching them up

Support for the sake of new guides coming in though

Read full topic

item.title: Guides child board
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:4, topic:508224”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=626463.msg4260187#msg4260187 date=1363392092]
I really wouldn’t mind the addition of a child board. But why make it a child board, just give it it’s own board considering RS2007 has its own category, it seems rather silly to create child boards then :P.
[/quote]Isn’t a child board like the sub forum board for that category? Very possible I used the wrong word for it[/quote]
A child board is a board within a board, like General Questions is the child board of General Discussion :P.

Read full topic

item.title: Guides child board
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Ruby:

I really wouldn’t mind the addition of a child board. But why make it a child board, just give it it’s own board considering RS2007 has its own category, it seems rather silly to create child boards then :P.

This.
Although I’m totally for this, I get the suspicion that this type of board would turn quiet after a while.
I’d like this though, would be a good place to reveal my log people and their prices.

Read full topic
